DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy celecoxib versus naproxen treatment knee osteoarthritis
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Celecoxib Versus Naproxen 6-Month Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis knee define American College Rheumatology criterion flare state baseline visit Functional Capacity Classification IIII Inflammatory arthritis gout/pseudogout acute flare within past 2 year ( subject fibrositis fibromyalgia exclude ) Received acetaminophen within 24 hour baseline visit Acute joint trauma index joint within past 3 month active symptom History gastrointestinal ( GI ) perforation , obstruction , bleed Diagnosed treated GI ulcer within 60 day prior first dose study medication Received corticosteroid hyaluronic acid within certain timeframe study
